name: OGE Energy Corp.
description: OGE Energy Corp. is a diversified energy company based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, primarily engaged in the generation and distribution of electricity. Founded in 1902, the company operates through its principal subsidiaries, Oklahoma Gas and Electric Company (OG&E) and Enogex LLC. OG&E provides electric service to more than 850,000 customers in Oklahoma and Arkansas, focusing on reliable service and innovative solutions to meet the growing energy needs of its customers. The company is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship, investing in renewable energy sources such as wind and solar power. OGE Energy's mission is to provide safe, reliable, and affordable energy while supporting the communities it serves. With a strong emphasis on customer service and technological advancement, OGE Energy is well-positioned to navigate the evolving energy landscape. The company also engages in natural gas distribution and transportation through its subsidiary Enogex, which serves industrial and commercial customers. As a leader in the energy sector, OGE Energy is focused on enhancing its infrastructure and developing cleaner energy solutions to contribute positively to the environment and the economy.
